1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

![city_council-43](https://www.deerparktx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=14842)

* First and third Tuesdays of each month
* Council Chambers at City Hall
  710 E San Augustine St.
  Deer Park, TX 77536

Special meetings and workshops are held as needed. Those wishing to speak before council may do so by registering by 7:25 p.m. on the day of the meeting. For further information, call the
[city secretary](https://www.deerparktx.gov/262/City-Secretary "city secretary")
's office at 281-479-2394.

Agendas and minutes are available
online
and posted on the city's bulletin board prior to the scheduled meeting .

The City Council consists of seven members, a mayor and six council members. The current members are:

* [Jerry Mouton Jr](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1023/Mayor "Mayor")
  ., Mayor
* [Sherry Garrison](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1024/Council-Member-Position-1 "Council Position 1")
  , Council Position 1
* [TJ Haight](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1026/Council-Member-Position-2)
  , Council Position 2
* [Tommy Ginn](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1027/Council-Member-Position-3 "Council Position 3")
  , Council Position 3

* [Justin League](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1028/Council-Member-Position-4 "Council Position 4")
  , Council Position 4
* [Ron Martin](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1029/Council-Member-Position-5 "Council Position 5")
  , Council Position 5
* [Georgette Ford](https://www.deerparktx.gov/1030/Council-Member-Position-6)
  , Council Position 6

The Mission of the City of Deer Park is to deliver exemplary municipal services that provide a high quality of life consistent with our history, culture, and unique sense of community.

City of Deer Park Vision Statement
----------------------------------

About the City Council
----------------------

The City of Deer Park has a council-manager form of government. Under this form of government, the elected City Council sets the policies for the operation of the city's government. The administrative responsibility rests with the
[city manager](https://www.deerparktx.gov/260/City-Manager "city manager")
who is appointed by the City Council.

Correspondence to the mayor and members of the City Council can be sent by
[email](mailto:cityhall@deerparktx.org "emailed")
or mailed to:
City of Deer Park
P.O. Box 700
Deer Park, TX 77536-0700
